text: Vinko Međimorec (born 1 June 1996 in Koprivnica) is a Croatian footballer who currently plays as a defender for Gabala in the Azerbaijan Premier League. ==Club career== On 8 September 2020, Međimorec signed a 1+1 year contract with Azerbaijan Premier League side Gabala FK. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Club statistics |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="6" valign="center"|Slaven Belupo |2015–16 |rowspan="5" valign="center"|Prva HNL |21||0||3||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||24||0 |- |2016–17 |8||1||1||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||9||1 |- |2017–18 |22||2||2||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||24||2 |- |2018–19 |27||0||2||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||29||0 |- |2019–20 |12||1||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||12||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !90!!4!!8!!0!!-!!-!!-!!-!!98!!4 |- |valign="center"|Gabala |2020–21 |Azerbaijan Premier League |3||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||3||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !93!!4!!8!!0!!-!!-!!-!!-!!101!!4 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian footballers Category:NK Slaven Belupo players Category:Croatian First Football League players Category:Gabala FC players Category:Azerbaijan Premier League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Azerbaijan Category:Association football defenders
title: Vinko Međimorec
